data.benefits: Scheme provides patent reimbursement of upto Rs. 2 lakhs for Indian patent and Rs. 10 lakhs for International Patent.
data.eligibility: All startups registered as a legal entity registered with RoC as Pvt Ltd or LLP are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
The patent applications which are filed only after 09.11.2015 will be considered.
The startup must be registered in Kerala, within 10 years from date of Incorporation and must have a DIPP and Udyog Aadhar.
The schemes are not applicable to Innovators.
The scheme supports only patents, not trademarks, copyrights or any other Intellectual Property Rights.
The scheme does not extend support to patent renewals and prosecutions against appellate authority who have already rejected one’s patent claims.
data.beneficiaries: All startups registered as a legal entity registered with RoC as Pvt Ltd or LLP are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
The patent applications which are filed only after 09.11.2015 will be considered.
The startup must be registered in Kerala, within 10 years from date of Incorporation and must have a DIPP and Udyog Aadhar.
The schemes are not applicable to Innovators.
The scheme supports only patents, not trademarks, copyrights or any other Intellectual Property Rights.
The scheme does not extend support to patent renewals and prosecutions against appellate authority who have already rejected one’s patent claims.
data.context: The scheme is introduced to provide support for startups and student entrepreneurs who are able to secure a patent.
data.objective: To provide support for startups and student entrepreneurs who are able to secure a patent.
data.description:
Scheme provides patent reimbursement:
Indian patent: Rs. 2 lakhs 
International Patent: Rs. 10 lakhs
data.how_to_apply: Applications for Patent Reimbursement can be submitted online through the link below: https://startups.startupmission.in/login
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the reimbursement in 3 stages during filing, prosecution and award.
data.additional_info: Activity Covered are: Provisional Patents Filings, Patent Search, Drafting, Filings, Claims Preparations, Fast tracking Fees, Claims prosecutions, Granting
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Original hard copy of Invoice & Receipt with authorized seal and signature from IPR India (by a registered Legal Consultant) for Consultation charges and / or IPR charges
2. Original Bank Statement showing amount transferred (Verified by Bank Manager).
3. A brief write up of the ideas/ claims applied for patent
4. Copy of provisional patent certificate, if any
5. Patent certificate, in case of patent received
6. Copies of various forms (patent application, early publish, early examination, changes in original application or any other document relevant to this) or respective receipts from IPR.
7. Residence Proof details of the director(s)/ applicant(s)
8. Company incorporation documents (Incorporation Certificates, MoA, AoA, DIN nos)
9. Copy of assigning and assignor agreement, if any. In such a case, NOC from the original inventor for reimbursing the patent cost to the startup to be furnished.
10. In case of the original inventor transferring technology to the startup, an NOC from the original inventor for reimbursing patent cost to the startup to be furnished.
11. In case the patent is filed before forming or registering the company, then such patent costs are reimbursed to startups, where the filed patent idea or technology is being pursued by the startup for building business.
12. Undertaking that the startup has not so far claimed and will not claim patent reimbursement costs from any other organisations/ govt. bodies and if found, they will pay twice the amount to KSUM, that is reimbursed through patent support scheme
13. Cancelled Cheque of the company and Bank details (Branch name, IFSC Code)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: G3B, Thejaswini, Technopark Campus, Kariyavattom, Trivandrum, Kerala 695581
Ph. No : 08047180470
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing and Service Industry - Limited Liability Partnership (LLP), Private Limited Company - Kerala - All MSMEs and Non-MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Establishment of brand and enhance quality output
